uan.legend: Which claim do you want to continue?

person-named.label: The person named on the duty to remove notice

has-legal-representative.label: An immigration advisor representing the claimant
has-legal-representative.hint: Such as a solicitor or legal representative. You must have already sent a letter of authority to the Home Office to confirm that you can represent the person named on the duty to remove letter.

someone-else.label: Someone helping the person named on the duty to remove notice
someone-else.hint: You cannot give immigration advice. You must answer all the questions as if you are the person named on the duty to remove letter.

is-risk-in-country.paragraph: This is physical or emotional harm which would be difficult or impossible to recover from.
is-risk-in-country.list5: discrimination against you by the police, legal system, or a political party

reason-in-sih.label: Explain why you would be at risk of serious and irreversible harm in [SIH country]
reason-in-sih.list1: why you specifically would be at risk
reason-in-sih.list2: what you would be at risk of, including what you think would happen to you
reason-in-sih.list3: what individuals or groups you fear in

anything-happened-details.label1: Has anything happened to you since you arrived in the UK which would make it unsafe for you to go to [SIH country]?
anything-happened-details.list2: why this would make it unsafe for you to go to [SIH country]

why-not-get-protection.label: Why would you not be able to get protection from this harm in [SIH country]?
